description:
Rent Smarter and Save Money.

If your traveling or your car is in the shop I can show you how to save money on your next car rental.

Benefits:

  • Learn how to save 20% to 40% or more off your rental car cost when flying and needing a rental car.
  • Types of membership programs you can join for FREE to save money with promotions
  • What membership cards will get you discounts and upgrades.
  • The secret to booking that can get you FREE Upgrades.
  • When to make your reservations for best savings.
  • Who to talk to about Free discounts, days, and upgrades when rental car area doesn't satisfy you.
  • How to haggle for a better deal, without angering the employee helping you.
  • Understand what is covered by the insurance company versus your insurance.
  • Get better rates using city miles, daily, weekly, monthly deals offered.


Scenario 1: Vacation

If you go and fly out for vacation for a week the car rental can sometime cost as much as $1000. Well I can save you $400 with just one simple trick. This $400 can be used for shopping, eating at fancy restaurants, scuba diving, extra days in disneyland, an extra couple days of vacation. This doesn't even include the coupons, rates, and Free upgrades you can also receive for additional 10% to 15% off .

Scenario 2: Car Is In The Shop

At some point or another your car may have to go in the shop for maintenance, car wreck, etc... and you need to rent a car. Your insurance company will pay the least amount they can get away with for your rental car or nothing at all. Now your stuck with a bill. Well you can save %10, get free upgrades, know when to book, how to get a better deal from this program.

At some point or another you are going to be using a rental car company for vacation or when your car is in the shop. I was shown the insider secrets on how to save the most amount of money you possibly can.

These simple tricks:

  • on best times to book,
  • who to talk to if your car reservation isn't there
  • Type of car to book for Free Upgrades
  • How to save 40% when flying on vacation
  • What to say to get the best price for your stay.
  • How to get FREE days for rental car

The information in this course is invaluable resource that you will be able to use the rest of your life.

This information is for anyone who:

1. When they go on vacation would rather have extra money to spend on experiences restaurants, hotels or simply like to have extra cash.

2. When there car is in the shop getting expensive repairs, doesn't want to spend large amounts of money to rent a car.

I hope you find a huge benift in this program that will last the rest of your life!


From The Desk Of,

John Thomas Mattison
title: Travel Smart: Maximize Discounts And Get Free Upgrades
